article_title: Crash Shuts Down WB Turner Turnpike Near Luther/Jones Exit - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
Westbound Turner Turnpike is shut down at mile marker 145, near the Luther/Jones exit, due to a crash involving a truck with a trailer.

Drivers are passing the accident on the shoulder.

Stay with News 9 and News9.com for updates.
